medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began 10 hours prior to presentation, starting periumbilically and migrating to the right lower quadrant. The patient experienced one episode of diarrhea but has not had any nausea, emesis, fevers, or chills. He has not wanted to eat since the pain began.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Seasonal and food allergies; pilonidal cyst excision.
